description: A widget to display PDF documents.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

src.description: The source of the document. Can be a path on the local file system or a `Blob`/`File` object.

zoomEnabled.description: Enables the pinch-to-zoom gesture. On iOS this will scale the entire document, while on Android each page is scaled individually.

spacing.description: The vertical spacing between the individual pages. The default is specific to the device and can not be changed on iOS.

pageElevation.description: Setting this property determines the intensity of the shadow page on the widget background. On iOS the shadow is either visible or not (property set to `0`), but always looks the same.

pageBackground.description: Determines the color visible in the transparent areas of a page.

padding.description: Additional space to add inside the widgets bounds.

load.description: Fired when the document loading has finished.

error.description: If this is `true` the loading process failed.
